create-account.title: Create an account.

You have received a verification email.
Please validate it to be able to access the website.

confirm-email.title: Check your email inbox
confirm-email.must-validate-email: You must validate your email to be able to access the website

reset-password.title: Check your email inbox
reset-password.content: You have received an email to reset your password

logout.content:
You have been disconnected.
We will redirect you...

error.no-user-with: No user found with the email {mail}.

form-validator.all-field-must-have-value: Every field has to be filled in

email.incorrect:
Incorrect email !
Check your email then validate again.

password.length: Password must have a minimum of {length} characters.
password.maj: Password must have atleast 1 uppercase letter.
password.min: Password must have atleast 1 lowercase letter.
password.special-char: Password must have atleast 1 special character.

firebase.user-not-found: No users were found with the information entered.
firebase.invalid-credential: An erreur has occured, please start again.
firebase.email-already-in-use: This email is already being used.
firebase.too-many-attempts: oo many attempts to connect, please try again later
firebase.user-disabled: Your account has been deactivated by the administrateur.
firebase.invalid-verification-code: The entered verification code is not valid.
firebase.invalid-verification-id: An erreur has occured, please start again.
firebase.default: A connection problem has occurred. Check your Internet connection
firebase.error: An erreur has occured, please try again.
